Text: I really appreciate all the time you take to upoad these books, and am always looking to see what you've uploaded next. Thank you so much.
Yeah, just wish people would do research... I posted The Innocent last night, someone request it elsewhere and the new uploader gets the credit. Feels like I get the piss taken out of me.

Can I just say one word.... awesome!
Thanks for taking the time to upload all books in both formats. Very much appreciated!
Wow a great selection ty for all your hard work
